summary: This is a financial transfer recap email from January 2014, detailing the movement of banking and investment assets from JPMorgan accounts to UBS accounts for Ghislaine Maxwell and several associated entities. It shows a total asset transfer of over $14.6 million, with a significant portion still in process.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Account holder and subject of financial transfers
persons.context: The primary individual whose personal and foundation accounts are being transferred from JPMorgan to UBS, with millions in assets listed.

events.title: Financial Transfer Recap
events.description: An email recapping the transfer of banking and investment accounts from JPMorgan to UBS for Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell held over $14.6 million in total assets across banking and investment accounts as of late 2013/early 2014.
The transfer involved moving assets from JPMorgan to UBS, with some accounts completed and others still in process.
Multiple entities are linked to Maxwell, including Max Foundation, 116 East 65th Street LLC, Pot and Kettle LLC, Ellmax LLC, TerraMar Project, Inc., and Max Hotel Services Corp.
Maxwell's investment accounts alone were valued at over $11.3 million, with the largest single account (Ghislaine Maxwell) holding approximately $5.26 million.
